item.title: 01 Mar 2017 00:00
item.description:
I’ve never ever done Ice Skating before. Will say no more!

The right foot kept rolling out. Possibly the shoe. Most likely my foot. Absolute fun, nevertheless.

#frogpond

item.title: 01 Mar 2017 00:00
item.description: 6 miler with just a raccoon sighting. Good pace finishing out in 1:10. The coyotes seem to be hibernating!
